background: A toy store owner purchases and sells plush toys and dolls, looking to optimize inventory spending for maximum profit within estimated sales limits.

parameters.definition: Cost of each plush toy for the store
Cost of each doll for the store
Maximum amount the store owner can spend on inventory
Profit made from selling each plush toy
Profit made from selling each doll
Minimum estimated number of plush toys sold each month
Maximum estimated number of plush toys sold each month
Maximum ratio of the number of dolls sold to plush toys sold

constraints.description: Total cost of plush toys and dolls should not exceed MaxInventory
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for the total cost of plush toys and dolls not exceeding MaxInventory
model.addConstr(CostPlush * PlushToysPurchased + CostDoll * DollsPurchased <= MaxInventory, name="max_inventory_constraint")

constraints.description: The number of plush toys sold must be at least the minimum estimated number sold per month
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for minimum plush toys sold
model.addConstr(PlushToysPurchased >= MinPlushSold, name="min_plush_sold_constraint")

constraints.description: The number of plush toys sold cannot exceed the maximum estimated number of plush toys sold per month
The number of dolls sold must be at most MaxDollsToPlushRatio times the number of plush toys sold
constraints.code:
# Dolls to plush toys sold constraint
model.addConstr(DollsPurchased <= MaxDollsToPlushRatio * PlushToysPurchased, name="dolls_to_plush_ratio")

constraints.description: Number of plush toys purchased must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Add constraint for non-negativity of the number of plush toys purchased
model.addConstr(PlushToysPurchased >= 0, name="non_negative_plush_toys_purchased")

constraints.description: The number of dolls purchased must be non-negative
constraints.code:
# Constraint: The number of dolls purchased must be non-negative
model.addConstr(DollsPurchased >= 0, name="doll_purchase_non_negative")

variables.definition: Number of plush toys purchased by the store
Number of dolls purchased by the store

objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling plush toys and dolls
objective.code:
# Define the objective function
model.setObjective(ProfitPlush * PlushToysPurchased + ProfitDoll * DollsPurchased, gp.GRB.MAXIMIZE)
